steps.name: Assert reset password message: Reset Password
Check for error toast when resetting password
Check if reset password popup is visible
Assert popup success message: An email has been send to the provided email with further instructions

parameters.name: expectedTitle
parameters.value: An email has been send to the provided email with further instructions
